name: Nyla AI
description: NYLA brings the blockchain directly into the social platforms people already use. Through Agent Nyla, users can send, swap, and interact with Solana tokens seamlessly across networks like X, Instagram, and Telegram—no friction, no complex wallet setup, just intuitive crypto-native experiences. NYLA is designed as a social-first crypto layer, turning usernames into wallets and conversations into on-chain actions. Built on Solana for speed and scalability, NYLA focuses on real utility, distribution, and mainstream adoption. The project has officially migrated from BONK to Pump.fun, aligning with the Pump ICM ecosystem to unlock stronger creator incentives, sustainable revenue, wider recognition and faster product development. NYLA’s mission is simple: bring the world on-chain by meeting users where they already are.
